title: Manage Cultural Heritage Site
description: During land clearing, a potential cultural heritage site (e.g., ancient artifacts) is discovered. All work must stop, and a heritage expert must be called.

tasks.description: A dozer operator reports finding unusual stone objects. The supervisor immediately halts all work in the area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Work is stopped to prevent damage to the potential site.

tasks.description: Log the discovery in the system and notify the HSE department.
Engage a qualified archaeologist to inspect the site and work with local indigenous groups to manage it appropriately.
tasks.expected_outcome: Experts are brought in to ensure the site is managed in a culturally sensitive and legally compliant manner.
